executor.hint: Whether the creature that executes the ability will be associated with this condition.
executor.label: Associate Executor

relation.hint: What the relationship between the effect and condition is.

target.hint: Whether to open a dialog to select tokens that will be associated with this condition.
target.label: Select Associations

common.hint: Simple one-off effects that don't require customization.
common.label: Impacts

duration.hint: A formula that evaluates to a number of the specified unit.
duration.label: Formula

mode.hint: The arithmetic operation to apply to this effect's duration.
mode.label: Mode

hacks.hint: The types of hack damage that this can apply.

reverse.hint: Remove hacks instead of adding them.
reverse.label: Reverse

consumeStatDice.hint: Check this if hit dice should be consumed on use.
consumeStatDice.label: Consume Hit Dice

forHarm.hint: Check this if the healing should be done for damage.
forHarm.label: For Damage

noStatDice.hint: Whether this only displays the option to heal hacks.
noStatDice.label: No Stat Dice

pseudoHook.hint: The hook that executes this macro when fired.
pseudoHook.label: Hook

relation.hint: Whether this macro can be run as a button from the chat message or hooks into other behavior.

hex.hint: Whether this is a hexproof roll.

consumeStatDice.hint: Check this if mana dice should be consumed on use.
consumeStatDice.label: Consume Mana Dice

forHarm.hint: Check this if the revitalizing should be done for drain.
forHarm.label: For Drain

formula.hint: The formula to use for the roll.
formula.label: Formula

merge.hint: Whether to merge this roll with other valid rolls of the same type that have merging enabled.
merge.label: Merge

consumeStatDice.hint: Whether this consumes stat dice by default.
consumeStatDice.label: Consume Stat Dice

forHarm.hint: Whether this rolls dice for harm by default.
forHarm.label: For Harm

relation.hint: Apply, remove, toggle, or include the condition as part of the ability's effect.

amount.hint: A numerical amount of the effect to take. Leave blank to have it be the result of the roll.
amount.label: Amount

bonus.hint: Formula that defines a bonus that gets added to the roll. Can be negative.
bonus.label: Bonus

threshold.hint: Formula that defines the DC for this roll. Can be left blank.
threshold.label: Threshold

abilityNames.hint: Abilities that this can directly cause the execution of.
abilityNames.label: Abilities

Errors.noAddPath: No path specified for addChange action
Errors.noDeletePath: No path specified for deleteChange action
Errors.noDeleteArray: No changes array found at path: {path}

base.hint: Base changes are the first ones applied. They take effect right after base data for documents have been set up and before any derived values have been determined.
base.label: Base

derivation.hint: Derivation changes apply once derived data has been calculated. This should only be used for effects where the changes themselves rely on data that's been derived.
derivation.label: Derivation

final.hint: These are the last changes that are applied. There is very minimal document data prep that occurs after these changes, so they should only be used for instances where nothing passively relies on them.
final.label: Final

fluency.hint: Fluency changes apply immediately after proficiency ones. This should be used exclusively for effects that make other documents fluent.
fluency.label: Fluency

normal.hint: Normal changes are the last ones applied before derived values are determined. This is the default time that changes are applied and should be used unless there is a specific reason to apply at some other time.
normal.label: Normal

proficiency.hint: Proficiency changes apply immediately after base ones. This should be used exclusively for effects that make other documents proficient.
proficiency.label: Proficiency

ApplyEffect.cantSustain: Could not attach effect to the one that's sustaining it.
ApplyEffect.label: Apply Effect

StandardDamage.noDefaultWeapon: {name} doesn't have a default attack weapon.

boosts.hint: A number of boosts to apply.
boosts.label: Boosts

crit.hint: Double the number of dice rolled. This applies after boosts and deboosts.
crit.label: Go Critical

deboosts.hint: A number of deboosts to apply
deboosts.label: Deboosts

formula.hint: The original formula. Make changes as needed, but do not directly apply boosts or deboosts.
formula.label: Roll Formula

ERRORS.cannotPull: Bag has {bagCount} stones. Cannot pull {toPullCount} stones from it.
ERRORS.maxStones: Bag has {count} stones. Maximum of 99 allowed.

PANEL.descriptionText: You are surrounded by darkness, but aren't alone. Something is reaching out to you. Something? Several things? It's not clear. You reach back, grasp something, and start to pull. It pulls you as well.
PANEL.name: Death Bag

Heal.hintNoDice: Click on the hacks you want to heal.
Heal.hintWithDice: Click on the hacks you want to heal and the hit dice you want to spend.

general.hint: This macro checks whether any actor that's selected has some {label} named {name} and makes them all use it.
general.label: General

linked.hint: This macro connects to this specific instance of {child} on {actor}.
linked.label: Linked

NewDocument.content: Would you like to import an existing {typeName} or create one from scratch?
NewDocument.title: New {name}

createChildren.hint: If checked, will create children that aren't present in the local document.
createChildren.label: Create Children

deleteChildren.hint: If checked, will delete children that aren't present in the compendium source.
deleteChildren.label: Delete Children

recursive.hint: If checked, refreshes will apply recursively.
recursive.label: Refresh Recursively

updateChildren.hint: If checked, will update children to match the compendium source.
updateChildren.label: Update Children

updateDocument.hint: If checked, will update local document to match the compendium source.
updateDocument.label: Update Document

bonus.hint: An additional bonus to apply to this roll.

competence.hint: Whether this roll has proficiency or fluency.

absent.label: Absent Conditions

present.hint: What conditions must be present in order for this ability to be active?
present.label: Present Conditions

dawn.hint: Does the effect expire at dawn?
dawn.label: Dawn

description.hint: Optional description that overrides the default duration text.
description.label: Description

stationary.hint: Do you need to be stationary for this ability to be active?
stationary.label: Stationary

unit.hint: The unit of time for this duration.
unit.label: Unit

faces.hint: Number of faces on each die.

enabled.hint: If this should be able to store other equipment within it.
enabled.label: Storage

maxCount.hint: The maximum number of other pieces of equipment this can store.
maxCount.label: Maximum Count
maxCount.over: Over Maximum Number of Items Carried

maxWeight.hint: The maximum weight this can store.
maxWeight.label: Maximum Weight

weightMultiplier.hint: An amount to multiply the weight of all things this stores by.
weightMultiplier.label: Weight Multiplier

autoColoration.hint: Automatically change this token's tint color when its actor is wounded.
autoColoration.label: Automatic Coloration

autoDetectionModes.hint: Automatically change this token's detection mode.
autoDetectionModes.label: Automatic Detection Modes

autoLighting.hint: Automatically configure light emitted from this token.
autoLighting.label: Automatic Lighting

autoMagic.hint: Automatically apply Token Magic FX to this token for relevant conditions.
autoMagic.label: Automatic Effects

autoScale.hint: Automatically scale this token to match its actor's size.
autoScale.label: Automatic Scale

autoTransformation.hint: Automatically change this token when its actor is transformed.
autoTransformation.label: Automatic Transformation

autoVisionAngle.hint: Automatically change this token's vision angle.
autoVisionAngle.label: Automatic Vision Angle

autoVisionModes.hint: Automatically change this token's vision mode.
autoVisionModes.label: Automatic Vision Modes

autoVisionRange.hint: Automatically change this token's vision range.
autoVisionRange.label: Automatic Vision Range

raw.hint: The quantity of the specified unit.
raw.label: Quantity

BlackGapless.hint: Whether there shouldn't be gaps between {name} blocks on this document's sheet.
BlackGapless.label: {name} Black Gapless

BlockSize.hint: Size that {name} blocks will be displayed at on this document's sheet.
BlockSize.label: {name} Block Size

roll.hint: If this expires on a roll, what is the roll that needs to be made?
roll.label: Roll

threshold.hint: What is the minimum value that needs to be rolled in order for this to expire?
threshold.label: Threshold

type.hint: What is the type of thing that causes this to expire?
type.label: What

skip.hint: A number of instances of the trigger firing to skip before this effect expires.
skip.label: Skip

time.hint: What is the timing for the trigger of this effect expiring?
time.label: When

trigger.hint: What is the trigger for this effect expiring?
trigger.label: Trigger

who.hint: Whose turn should this effect attempt to expire on?
who.label: Who

Competence.hint: If this is proficient or fluent.
Competence.label: Competence

enabled.hint: Whether this effect causes a transformation. Note that this isn't just for "transformation effect"s, but for any case in which another species' stats should be applied (such as animating as an undead).
enabled.label: Causes Transformation

folder.hint: The folder of candidate species to transform into.
folder.label: Folder

image.hint: Optional overriding art to apply to the target.
image.label: Token Art

level.hint: How strong of a transformation this is.
level.label: Transformation Level

multiple.hint: Allow selection of multiple species to transform into at the same time.
multiple.label: Multiple Selection

select.hint: Select a subset of the species to turn into instead of all of them.
select.label: Select

bodyParts.hint: Whether this should suppress body parts not provided by the transformation.
bodyParts.label: Suppress Body Parts

equipment.hint: Whether this should suppress equipment not provided by the transformation.
equipment.label: Suppress Equipment

fluencies.hint: Whether this should suppress fluencies not provided by the transformation.
fluencies.label: Suppress Fluencies

ranks.hint: Whether this should suppress ranks not provided by the transformation.
ranks.label: Suppress Ranks

useFolder.hint: Use a folder of species instead of defining each individually.
useFolder.label: Use Folder

uuids.hint: The species this transforms the target into.
uuids.itemHint: A specific species this transforms the target into.
uuids.label: Species
uuids.validationError: Only species can be transformed into.

armorSuppressesRanks.hint: Alternate rule. If enabled, wearing AV above a rank's maximum suppresses it.
armorSuppressesRanks.name: Armor Suppresses Ranks

armorWeakensRanks.hint: Alternate rule. If enabled, wearing AV above a rank's maximum removes proficiency.
armorWeakensRanks.name: Armor Weakens Ranks

automaticPanelCollapseTime.hint: Automatically collapse chat message panels older than this many minutes.
automaticPanelCollapseTime.name: Automatic Panel Collapse Time

automaticTokenMagicConditionEffects.hint: Automatically add visual effects to tokens based on their current conditions. Requires the Token Magic FX module.
automaticTokenMagicConditionEffects.name: Automatic Token Magic Condition Effects

automaticallyChangeVisionModes.hint: If enabled, vision modes will automatically be changed based on abilities and down state.
automaticallyChangeVisionModes.name: Automatically Change Vision Modes

automaticallyPayAbilityCosts.hint: If enabled, HP, MP, and GP costs of abilities will be paid automatically upon use.
automaticallyPayAbilityCosts.name: Automatically Pay Ability Costs

compendiumTooltips.hint: If enabled, tooltips will be displayed for compendium entries.
compendiumTooltips.name: Compendium Tooltips

confirmStatDiceRerolls.hint: If enabled, spent stat dice will require confirmation before rerolling.
confirmStatDiceRerolls.name: Confirm Stat Dice Rerolls

contentLinkTooltips.hint: If enabled, tooltips will be displayed for content links.

damageTypeSources.hint: Journals that contain damage types that can be referenced when building damage rolls.
damageTypeSources.name: Damage Type Sources

defaultPanelCollapseState.hint: Default state for chat message panels.
defaultPanelCollapseState.name: Default Panel Collapse State

developerMode.hint: Check this if you are a developer of the Teriock system and need additional features. Do not check this otherwise. It is likely to break your game. Even module developers shouldn't check this.
developerMode.name: Developer Mode

drainTypeSources.hint: Journals that contain drain types that can be referenced when building drain rolls.
drainTypeSources.name: Drain Type Sources

floatingActorTabs.hint: Whether tabs on actor sheets hover outside the window frame.
floatingActorTabs.name: Floating Actor Tabs

gmDocumentNotesJournalName.hint: Name of the journal entry that linked document notes will automatically be added to.
gmDocumentNotesJournalName.name: GM Document Notes Journal Name

hideBasicAbilitiesByDefault.hint: If enabled, basic abilities will be hidden by default on all actor sheets.
hideBasicAbilitiesByDefault.name: Hide Basic Abilities by Default

hideInactiveDocumentsByDefault.hint: If enabled, inactive documents will be hidden by default on all actor sheets.

placeTemplateOnAbilityUse.hint: If enabled, using abilities with an area of effect will automatically place a measured template.
placeTemplateOnAbilityUse.name: Place Template on Ability Use

playerMacrosFolderName.hint: Name of the folder for macros players create with hotbar drops.

rollAttackOnArmamentUse.hint: If enabled, using armaments will automatically roll Basic Attack.
rollAttackOnArmamentUse.name: Roll Attack on Armament Use

secretEquipment.hint: If enabled, equipment will be secret when used by default.
secretEquipment.name: Secret Armaments

showRollDialogs.hint: If enabled, a dialog will be shown before making most rolls.
showRollDialogs.name: Show Roll Dialogs

sidebarTooltips.hint: If enabled, tooltips will be displayed for sidebar entries.
sidebarTooltips.name: Sidebar Tooltips

sortNewPlayerMacros.hint: New player macros will be created in folders corresponding to the individual players.
sortNewPlayerMacros.name: Sort New Player Macros

styleDice.hint: Style dice based on damage type, drain type, etc. Requires Dice So Nice! module.

systemLinks.hint: If enabled, links that can be opened within Foundry will do so instead of to the wiki.

systemTooltips.name: System Tooltips

twoHandedEquipment.hint: If enabled, equipment will be two-handed when used by default.
